name: Pizza Margherita
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish cooked with spiced chicken and aromatic herbs.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls served with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Crispy corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and salsa.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Grilled beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

name: Burrito
description: A flour tortilla filled with meat, beans, rice, and other toppings, wrapped into a cylindrical shape.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese, baked to perfection.

name: Doner Kebab
description: Sliced meat (typically lamb or chicken) served in a pita or wrap with fresh vegetables.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Spaghetti with a creamy sauce made of eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Pho
description: A fragrant noodle soup with beef or chicken, herbs, and rice noodles in a savory broth.

name: Paella
description: A classic Spanish dish with saffron-infused rice, seafood, meat, and vegetables.

name: Falafel
description: Deep-fried balls of chickpeas, herbs, and spices, typically served with tahini sauce.

name: Ramen
description: Noodle soup served with various toppings like boiled eggs, vegetables, and meat.

name: Sushi
description: Vinegared rice combined with seafood, vegetables, or sometimes tropical fruits.

name: Tacos
description: Corn or flour tortillas filled with meat, cheese, lettuce, and salsa.

name: Sauerbraten
description: A marinated pot roast served with gravy and traditional sides like red cabbage and dumplings.

name: Shakshuka
description: Poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce, often served with pita bread.

name: Goulash
description: A rich and hearty stew made from meat, vegetables, and paprika.

name: Biryani
description: A flavorful rice dish made with meat, spices, and herbs, often served with yogurt sauce.

name: Kimchi
description: Spicy fermented cabbage, usually served as a side dish or added to meals.

name: Ceviche
description: Fresh raw fish marinated in citrus juices and mixed with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers.

name: Moussaka
description: A baked casserole made of layered eggplant, minced meat, and b√©chamel sauce.

name: Empanadas
description: Fried or baked pastry filled with meat, cheese, or vegetables.

name: Clam Chowder
description: A creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, and celery.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Marinated chicken cooked in a traditional clay oven, giving it a smoky flavor.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy fettuccine pasta cooked in rich Alfredo sauce with parmesan.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Chunks of marinated paneer grilled to perfection with spices.

name: Ramen Bowl
description: Steamy bowl of noodles with broth, meat, egg, and vegetables.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Tacos filled with battered fish, coleslaw, and lime crema.

name: Hot Dog
description: Grilled sausage in a bun with mustard, ketchup, and onions.
